div.h3: Welcome to Johnson County School District #1

div.p: Johnson County School District #1 recognizes the Coronavirus has impacted education for our students and staff in ways we are still understanding and will continue to experience for some time.
During this situation, the District will continue to post updates on our website and make calls to parents/guardians as needed.
Principals and teachers will remain accessible via email and someone will be available at the Administration Office from 8 – 4 Monday – Friday 684-9571.
We are committed to serving our students to the best of our abilities as we sort through this unknown circumstance.

Johnson County School District #1 collaborates with our communities to graduate every student with the information, confidence, responsibility, and skills to be prepared for college, career, and the workforce.
Johnson County School District #1 guarantees a learning environment where every student grows every day in his or her overall well-being and academic achievement.
